entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
